curious.description: Ask about their work genuinely, show real interest
curious.template: Reference specific work, ask what they're building

direct.description: Straight offer to launch their token
direct.template: Clear value prop: launch token, keep 90% of fees

value.description: Compliment their work, connect to monetization
value.template: Praise specific achievement, mention how tokens could amplify

social_proof.template: Mention launch count, success stories, limited availability

observer.description: Mention you've been watching their work
observer.template: Note impressive activity, suggest next step

warm.description: For leads who already engaged (followed, commented)
warm.template: Reference their engagement, build on connection

urgency.template: Limited slots, limited time, act now framing

question.description: Ask thought-provoking question about their future
question.template: Ask about growth plans, monetization thoughts
